content:
SequenceDesigner Class

Definition

Provides design-time support for SequenceActivity and all classes that derive from it.

In this Article

[System.Obsolete("The System.Workflow.* types are deprecated.  Instead, please use the new types from System.Activities.*")]
[System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerTheme(typeof(System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequenceDesignerTheme))]
public class SequenceDesigner : System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialActivityDesigner

Remarks

Note

This material discusses types and namespaces that are obsolete. For more information, see Deprecated Types in Windows Workflow Foundation 4.5.

SequenceDesigner provides design-time support for the following classes that derive from SequenceActivity:

  • EventDrivenActivity
  • IfElseBranchActivity
  • StateFinalizationActivity
  • StateInitializationActivity
  • TransactionScopeActivity
  • SynchronizationScopeActivity
  • ReplicatorActivity

Constructors

SequenceDesigner()

Initializes a new instance of the SequenceDesigner class.

public SequenceDesigner ();
